Package com.paiondata.aristotle.service.impl

Class NodeServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.paiondata.aristotle.service.impl.NodeServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeService
@Service public class NodeServiceImpl extends Object implements NodeService
Service implementation for managing graph nodes. This class provides methods for CRUD operations on graph nodes and their relationships.

  • Method Details

    • getNodeByUuid

      public Optional<NodeVO> getNodeByUuid(String uuid)
      Retrieves a graph node by its UUID.
      Specified by:
      getNodeByUuid in interface NodeService
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the graph node
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the graph node if found, or an empty Optional if not found

    • createAndBindGraphAndNode

      public List<NodeVO> createAndBindGraphAndNode(NodeCreateDTO nodeCreateDTO, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Creates and binds nodes to an existing graph based on the provided DTO.

      Checks if the provided Neo4j transaction (tx) is null, a IllegalArgumentException is thrown. Retrieves the graph UUID from the nodeCreateDTO. If the graph is not found, a NoSuchElementException is thrown. Calls the checkInputRelationsAndBindGraphAndNode(List, List, String, Transaction) method to create and bind the nodes and their relations. Returns the list of created nodes.

      Specified by:
      createAndBindGraphAndNode in interface NodeService
      Parameters:
      nodeCreateDTO - The DTO containing information for creating the nodes and their relations.
      It includes the graph UUID and the node and relation details.
      tx - The Neo4j transaction object used for the database operation.
      Returns:
      The list of created nodes, each represented by a NodeVO object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided transaction is null.
      NoSuchElementException - If the graph with the specified UUID is not found.

    • createGraphAndBindGraphAndNode

      public GraphVO createGraphAndBindGraphAndNode(GraphAndNodeCreateDTO graphNodeCreateDTO, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Creates a graph and binds it with a node based on the provided DTO.

      Checks if the provided Neo4j transaction (`tx`) is null. If it is, a `TransactionException` is thrown. Creates and binds a graph using the provided `GraphCreateDTO` and the transaction. Constructs a `GraphAndNodeVO` object with the UUID, title, and description of the created graph. If no node information is provided in the `graphNodeCreateDTO`,
      the method returns the constructed `GraphAndNodeVO`. If node information is provided, it calls the `checkInputRelationsAndBindGraphAndNode` method to create and bind the nodes and their relations. Sets the created nodes in the `GraphAndNodeVO` and returns it.

      Specified by:
      createGraphAndBindGraphAndNode in interface NodeService
      Parameters:
      graphNodeCreateDTO - The DTO containing information for creating the graph and node.
      It includes the graph creation details and optional node and relation details.
      tx - The Neo4j transaction object used for the database operation.
      Returns:
      The created graph node, represented by a GraphVO object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided transaction is null.

    • deleteByUuids

      @Transactional public void deleteByUuids(NodeDeleteDTO nodeDeleteDTO)
      Deletes graph nodes by their UUIDs.

      Extracts the graph UUID and the list of node UUIDs from the provided nodeDeleteDTO. Iterates over the list of node UUIDs. For each UUID, it checks if the node exists in the graph using the getNodeByUuid(String) method. If the node is not found, it throws a NoSuchElementException with an error message including the UUID. It then checks if the node is bound to another user using
      the NodeRepository.getNodeByGraphUuidAndNodeUuid(String, String) method. If the node is bound to another user, it throws a IllegalStateException
      with an error message including the UUID. Finally, it deletes the nodes with the specified UUIDs using the
      NodeRepository.deleteByUuids(List) method.

      Specified by:
      deleteByUuids in interface NodeService
      Parameters:
      nodeDeleteDTO - the DTO containing the list of UUIDs of the graph nodes to be deleted.
      It includes the graph UUID and the list of node UUIDs.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if any node with the specified UUID is not found in the graph
      IllegalStateException - if any node is bound to another user

    • updateNode

      public void updateNode(NodeUpdateDTO nodeUpdateDTO, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Updates a graph node based on the provided DTO.

      Extracts the UUID from the provided nodeUpdateDTO. Retrieves the graph node by the extracted UUID using the getNodeByUuid(String) method. If the node is found, it updates the node using
      the NodeMapper.updateNodeByUuid(NodeUpdateDTO, String, Transaction) method. If the node is not found, it throws a NoSuchElementException with an error message including the UUID.

      Specified by:
      updateNode in interface NodeService
      Parameters:
      nodeUpdateDTO - the DTO containing information for updating the node.
      It includes the UUID and other update parameters.
      tx - the transaction object used for the database operation
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the node with the specified UUID is not found in the graph

    • updateRelation

      @Transactional public void updateRelation(RelationUpdateDTO relationUpdateDTO)
      Updates graph node relations based on the provided DTO.

      Extracts the graph UUID, update map, and delete list from the provided relationUpdateDTO. If the update map is not null and not empty, it calls the validateAndUpdateRelations(Map, String)
      method to validate and update the specified graph node relations. If the delete list is not null and not empty, it calls the validateAndDeleteRelations(List, String)
      method to validate and delete the specified graph node relations.

      Specified by:
      updateRelation in interface NodeService
      Parameters:
      relationUpdateDTO - the DTO containing information for updating the graph node relations.
      It includes the graph UUID, a map of relations to update, and a list of relations to delete.

    • getkDegreeExpansion

      public GraphVO getkDegreeExpansion(String graphUuid, String nodeUuid, Integer k)
      Retrieves the k-degree expansion of a graph from a given node.

      This method first checks if the graph with the specified UUID exists. If the graph does not exist, it throws a NoSuchElementException. If the graph exists, it delegates the k-degree expansion to the `nodeMapper` to perform the actual expansion.

      Specified by:
      getkDegreeExpansion in interface NodeService
      Parameters:
      graphUuid - The UUID of the graph.
      nodeUuid - The UUID of the starting node.
      k - The desired depth of expansion.
      Returns:
      A GraphVO object containing the expanded nodes and relationships.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If the graph with the specified UUID does not exist.
